Docs.summary: Represents a collection of HTTP protocol and framework parameters.

remarks.para: Represents a collection of HTTP protocol and framework parameters.
Added in 4.0.
This member is deprecated. Please use java.net.URL#openConnection instead. Please visit this webpage for further details.
